name: Rosenhoej+Partner
goal:
Rosenhoej+Partner offers public affairs and fundraising services that help shape your business across the board through ex.

-Outreach to ex. EU decision makers
-Outreach to member states government and other stakholders
-Fundraising and project development ex. Horizon2020 and INTERREG
-Strategic advice & messaging
-Coalition building
-Lectures and teaching

We will help SMEs, public institutions and NGO?s to act in relation to national, EU and other institutions in visualizing there possibilities in ex the EU system.
We help you with project advice and clarification regarding to funding, establishment of an international network and the preparation of applications. Development of an international and fundraising strategy, including advice for political communication and relationships.
interests: Communication, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks

EU cooperation with non-EU countries focuses on the management of migration flows and the tackling of common security challenges.
